definition: simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: It is too strong and concise, not diffuse enough for a woman.
sentences.chinese: 那太简明有力了，不象一个罗里罗嗦的女子。

sentences.english: A concise, clever, often paradoxical statement.
sentences.chinese: 隽语一个简明，机智，经常似是而非的陈述。

sentences.english: Tallmadge said Mrs. Obama makes the problem easy to understand.
sentences.chinese: 托尔马奇说，奥巴马夫人使该问题简明化。

sentences.english: The test is simple and has a straightforward scoring system.
sentences.chinese: 这个测试是简单的，而且有一个简明易懂的计分系统。

sentences.english: Finally, a simple and compendious summary is presented.
sentences.chinese: 最后对此次设计进行了简明，扼要的总结。

sentences.english: I myself agree with the compendious and simple analysis of this schoolgirl.
sentences.chinese: 我本人同意这位女生的简明质朴的分析。

sentences.english: Studies on meteoroid streams are briefly and systematically presented.
sentences.chinese: 对流星群的研究作了简明而系统的介绍。

sentences.english: Can you sum up the central idea of this ancient poem in plain terms?
sentences.chinese: 你能用简明的语言概括这首古诗的中心思想吗？

sentences.english: I got information from the television bulletin.
sentences.chinese: 这一消息我是从电视简明新闻中得知的。

sentences.english: American Journey, Concise Edition, The, Combined.
The news reports of journalists of radio and TV station need to be concise.
sentences.chinese: 电台和电视台的记者的新闻报道必须简明扼要。

sentences.english: Note the compendious final life of the emperors and their descendants who had great impact on the history.
sentences.chinese: 历史上有较大影响的帝王及其后裔附注其简明结局。

sentences.english: Offers a concise yet thorough presentation of engineering mechanics theory and application.
sentences.chinese: 提供工程力学理论和应用的简明而彻底的赠送。

sentences.english: Keep the message clear and concise.
A concise report on the study of the Chemical structures of Fritillaria alkaloids is given.
sentences.chinese: 简明报导贝母植物碱化学结构的研究。

sentences.english: Keep all things short and to the point.

definition: variant of 簡練|简练[jian3 lian4]
to understand clearly/to be clear about/plain/clear/also written 明瞭|明了[ming2 liao3]
to understand clearly/to be clear about/plain/clear
to concentrate on the main points (idiom); to bring out the essentials
